title: AI agents open door to new hacking threats
description: NEW YORK — Cybersecurity experts are warning that artificial intelligence agents, widely considered the next frontier in the generative AI revolution, could wind up getting hijacked and doing the dirty work for hackers.
content:

title: How Are AI Video Generators Transforming Modern Video Production?
description: Artificial intelligence has made remarkable progress in automating creative tasks, and one field that is completely transformed is the video production. Modern AI video generators are transforming how videos are planned, created, and published. These tools allow anyone to create professional-quality production and save several hours of editing work, from small creators to large marketing […]

title: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman on AGI, Evolving OpenAI Relationship
description: A renegotiated deal lets Microsoft independently pursue artificial general intelligence. Suleyman is seizing the moment.
content:
In the race to build powerful artificial intelligence, Microsoft has had its hands tied behind it back for years. Now, the software giant is free to compete, according to top executive Mustafa Suleyman.

title: Larger corporations outpace smaller firms in scaling Artificial Intelligence: McKinsey Report
description: The report found that while nearly nine out of ten companies are now using AI in at least one business function, most remain in the pilot or experimentation phase, with only about a third having scaled their AI programs across the enterprise.
content:
New Delhi [India], November 11 (ANI): The larger corporations are emerging as frontrunners in scaling artificial intelligence (AI) beyond the pilot phase, according to a recent survey report by McKinsey & Company.

title: Arsenal news: Why did Arsene Wenger warn Mikel Arteta about the use of artificial intelligence?
description: Arsene Wenger has issued a warning to Mikel Arteta about the growing use of artificial intelligence (AI) at Arsenal.
content:
For the Frenchman, AI is useful in evaluating data and scenarios, but cannot take the place of a manager's sensitivity and instinct.

title: OpenAI may not use lyrics without license, German court rules
description: MUNICH (Reuters) -A German court on Tuesday sided with the country's music rights society GEMA in a closely watched copyright case against U.S.-based artificial intelligence firm OpenAI.
content:
MUNICH (Reuters) -A German court on Tuesday sided with the country's music rights society GEMA in a closely watched copyright case against U.S.-based artificial intelligence firm OpenAI.
